title: Heartbreak Guitar
description: Xoe is a rocking guitarist, with the world at her feet, but as tragedy strikes again she heads for the security of home. Xoe learns that by going home it teaches one to laugh again and rebuild a world away from the black spiral of depression.Casper is intrigued by the enigma that is Zoe........from the first time she collapses at his feet in tormented grief. As he learns more about her he vows to ensure that her face learns to smile again.Can Xoe let this rocker into her life and heart?ePub ISBN: 978-0-473-35282-0Paperback ISBN: 978-0-473-35281-3
author: Cindy Hargreaves
